item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Compound is Wordpress template created in minimalistic design style. You can create the corporate or personal websites by many features that can customise your presentation via simple changing of several settings. [raw] [one_third] [frame] HOME SETTINGS Layout Settings andSlider Preferences [/frame][/one_third] [one_third] [frame] PAGE LAYOUT Page Properties andColorVariations [/frame][/one_third] [one_third_last] [frame] MAIN FEATURES Our Shortcodes andOtherFeatures [/frame][/one_third_last] [/raw] [modal-link name="modal1"][/modal-link] Compound theme comes with various subpages fixed or flexible height with smart or expanded sidebar. Have a look at examples here. [raw] [modal-content name="modal1" width="600px" height="500px"] Modal: Main Features & Colors Our powerful Admin panel will allows you to set your own colors to many important parts of the website. You wont have to edit anything in CSS files. [image][/image] Main Compound Features [list style="style1"] Minimalistic Clean & Universal Design Style Impressive Anything Slider with Picture & Video Slides Smart Layout with Global & Individual Page Styles Universal Portfolio & Many Useful Shortcodes Customisable Colors & Backgrounds in all Sections [/list] The Compound is minimalist theme that will also allows you to create content rich website. Theme can be very compact or you can expand it to look as normal website. Whole website was designed with an iPad

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Shortcodes will help you create a professional looking website in no time. All shortcodes can be inserted into your web content directly from Wordpress WYSIWYG editor using our custom built AIT Buttons. Shortcodes can be used anywhere in pages, posts and also in widgets. That means you can put professionally looking content into your sidebar, inside or outside footer as well. [image][/image] Common Useful Shortcodes To create or combine all of the shortcodes you may need this universal types of shortcodes. Its recommanded to wrap complicated shortcodes to [raw] .. [/raw] shortcode to disable WP autoformatting. [raw] [frame bgcolor="#333333"] [code][raw] .. content .. [/raw] // Disables WP autoformatting[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#333333"] [code][rule] // Classic horizontal rule[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#333333"] [code][rule_top] // Horizontal rule with TOP button[/code] [/frame] [/raw]

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes will help you create a professional looking website in no time. All shortcodes can be inserted into your web content directly from Wordpress WYSIWYG editor using our custom built AIT Buttons. Shortcodes can be used anywhere in pages, posts and also in widgets. That means you can put professionally looking content into your sidebar, inside or outside footer as well. [image][/image] [rule]

Common Useful Shortcodes

To create or combine all of the shortcodes you may need this universal types of shortcodes. It's recommanded to wrap complicated shortcodes to [raw] .. [/raw] shortcode to disable WP autoformatting. [raw] [frame bgcolor="#DFF8FF" version="light"] [code][lang=en] .. content .. [/lang] ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Content will be displayed in English language version only. This shortcode can be useful for the widget's titles or other textareas, too.[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][raw] .. content .. [/raw] // Disables WP autoformatting[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][rule] // Classic horizontal rule[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][rule_top] // Horizontal rule with TOP button[/code] [/frame] [/raw]

Common Classes you may need

.clearfix clearing of floated elements - use on superordinate element
.fl for floating left
.fr for floating right
.uppercase sets text-transform to uppercase style
.bold sets font-weight to bold style
.thumb on IMG sets transparent border above the image
.aligncenter sets elements to the center
.alignleft sets floating to left with right margin
.alignright sets floating to right with left margin
.cleanmargin sets margins to 0px
.cleanmargin-bottom sets bottom margin to 0px
.cleanpadding sets paddingss to 0px
.clean-line sets line-height to the default value

item.title: Modal Windows
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[raw] [one_fourth]

[modal-link name="modal1"]Text link to show Modal Window[/modal-link]

[/one_fourth] [three_fourth_last]

Open Modal by Text link

This is the picture link to open custom modal window. Click on the icon to show the content of this Modal Window. [/three_fourth_last] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][modal-link name="modal1"]Text link to show Modal Window[/modal-link][/code] [/frame] [/raw]

[raw] [one_fourth] [modal-link name="modal1"][/modal-link] [/one_fourth] [three_fourth_last]

Open Modal by Picture or Icon link

This is the standard text link to open custom modal window. Click on the link to show the content of this Modal Window. [/three_fourth_last] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][modal-link name="modal1"]<img src="...">[/modal-link][/code] [/frame] [/raw] [raw] [one_fourth] [button title="OPEN" modalname="modal1" description="Modal Window" width="100%" version="light" position="left" bgcolor="#5FCAFF" color="#FFFFFF"] [/one_fourth] [three_fourth_last]

Open Modal by Button link

This is the button created by shortcode to open custom modal window. Click on the button to show the content. [/three_fourth_last] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][button title="OPEN" modalname="modal1" description="Modal Window" width="100%" version="light" position="left" bgcolor="#5FCAFF" color="#FFFFFF"][/code] [/frame] [/raw]  

Modal Window Content

You need to define the Modal Window Content somewhere on the end of the page to create something like this. You can define several modal windows and call them by the name parameter. [raw] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][modal-content name="modal1" width="600px" height="550px"] Content [/modal-content] [/code] [/frame] [/raw] [raw] [modal-content name="modal1" width="600px" height="550px" ]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi Lorena,thanks for your interest and wemloce!I think building a cool survey will not be a huge problem, as there are plenty of possible solutions on the web, the most simple of them (those without advanced features such as logic, for instance) are even free. We are going to try SurveyGizmo but i am not sure how good it is yet, i will let you know soon.The focus should be on the distribution issue, which in my opinion is much more problematic (or expensive).I guess you will need a very big number of responders, and for that you might need to involve a third party which has an expertise in distribution/marketing however, a relatively small number of responders could be initially found with the potential help of the admin of the master of affective neuroscience itself. I think that that there are two possible interesting mailing lists for you: 1) the past and present applicants to the master (previously called certificate in mood and anxiety disorder), which exists since 20 years, they will ranging between 100-500 names i guess 2) a list of psychiatry and psychology centers to which the master administration regularly send advertisements, leaflets, posters to recruit applicants.It might be that, as you and alberto are members of ICANS , which is in a way a sort of creature of the master , the admin of the Master will agree in sharing these lists with you.Could be worth to give a try cheersAlessandro
